title: Professor Pixel User Progress
description: Schema for tracking a user's progress through the curriculum, including XP, level, and achievements.

userId.description: A unique identifier for the user.

xp.description: The total experience points the user has accumulated.

level.description: The user's current level, calculated based on their XP.

completedLessons.description: A list of unique lesson identifiers that the user has completed.

achievements.description: A list of achievements the user has unlocked.

id.description: A unique identifier for the achievement, e.g., 'first-game-completed'.

name.description: The name of the achievement, e.g., 'First Game Completed'.

description.description: A description of how to unlock the achievement.

unlockedAt.description: The date and time the achievement was unlocked.
